node.display_long_description:
Wonderglade magically teleports you to an ever-growing theme park where you can enjoy carnival-themed classic games and totally new experiences with friends and family like never before. 

Now available on Quest, the game taps into the benefits of the headset and Oculus Touch controllers to add some hilariously entertaining moments for you and those witnessing as you putt, tilt, spray, spin and laugh your way through all the levels. Once inside Wonderglade, you can play six mini-games, enjoy a pass and play mode, and earn tickets to redeem at the Wonder Wheel.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Wonderglade Quest Patch notes
- Improved frame rate stability in Magic Mayhem
- Improved frame rate for scene transitions
- Fixed issue in Tip&Tilt and Tiny Tee causing player to select multiple options on the same button press
- Flyswatter Wand doesn't stretch when game is paused
- Pass & Play pause is better placed
- Pressing Pause brings up pause menu in Tiny Tee
- Fixed issue causing the Golf Putter to not register hits

node.reviewDescription:
I had this on the Go and when I saw this for quest, had to have it. However this is a disappointing rewrite. Much of it is identical but where they have seen fit to make use of 6dof have messed up the best of the games.

The wand waving game is the best conversion and uses 6dof perfectly. The only improvement.

Firefighting has a balcony getting in the way, so this was a nice sit down game, now you have to stand to see over the balcony. No.

Cow table racing. Nothing changed it works. Not favourite though.

Golf, what is going on with the control system, I think this could be better needs more practice.

Hammer the plates. Thisbis just plain broken, it doesn't register I banged the gong. Over and over and over I hit it to start the game and nothing, occasionally registers on a back swing thru the gong. Then the game is pretty bad anyway seems that I have to hit everything 10 times more than on the go version.

Lastly the best game is ruined. Hamster basketball. First that commentating hamster is in the wrong place its been repositioned in front of the targets, move the thing. The use of 6dof for aim and throw and fire is terrible, this was a nice flick of the wrist moderately tricky, now this thing wants echo vr throwing skills and the constant pickup instead if being there to throw is ruining the gameplay. 

The devs need to go back to what made this game great on the go, remember it's for kids and a pick up and drop mini game system. Instead of just converting what you had, you thought you would tweak it and you forgot the basics of what makes a good game. 

If they fix this I'll change this review, don't waste you money on a this till the devs change it back.

developerResponse.body: Thank you very much for sharing this extensive feedback. Please know that this is something we will take into consideration and it has not gone unnoticed. We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know what you think.

website_page_meta.description: Wonderglade taps into the Oculus Touch controllers to add some hilariously entertaining moments for you and those witnessing as you putt, tilt, spray, spin and laugh your way through all the carnival-themed classic games. Once inside the ever-growing Wonderglade theme-park, you can play six mini-games, enjoy a pass and play mode, and earn tickets to redeem at the Wonder Wheel.
